title: Can I still buy rune pages
body:
Sorry if it's a stupid question, 
but I can't seem to find rune pages in the store?
Are they still here?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm not 100% sure as to whether or not this is intentional, but here's the problem and how to fix it.

There's a dropdown under **Gameplay > Runes** to filter by tier, change this to **Show All** and the option to buy additional rune pages should become visible.

http://puu.sh/rURf0/4e01ae656d.jpg
